mapper.sql: id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_type, parent_id, path, component, icon, sort_order, status, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_code FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0
SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order
SELECT * FROM sys_permission WHERE permission_type = 1 AND status = 1 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order
